translation.en: [newscaster] You're watching Channel 38, Austin. Building a better Texas.
translation.zh:
您正在收看38频道 这里是奥斯汀
《打造更棒的德克萨斯州》

translation.en: Now, from your 24-hour news service, this is Good Morning Austin.
translation.zh:
现在为您播报24小时新闻
这里是《早安奥斯汀》节目 （根据真实故事改编）

translation.en: People in the Southwest are looking for relief from a deadly heat wave.
translation.zh:
（根据真实故事改编） 人们在经历了一波热浪后
开始寻求清凉

translation.en: A few areas, like Fort Worth, Texas, and parts of Oklahoma, saw rain Monday
translation.zh:
个别地区 比如德克萨斯州的沃思堡
以及俄克拉何马局部地区 在周一就迎来了长期以来的首次降雨

translation.en: for the first time in a long time.
translation.zh: 在周一就迎来了长期以来的首次降雨

translation.en: But for most, the month-long drought continues.
translation.zh:
但对全国大部分地区而言
长达一个月的干旱仍将持续

translation.en: -NBC's Cummins reports. -[dog barking]
translation.zh: 全国广播公司记者 康明斯报道

translation.en: [Robin on recording] You've reached the Murray O'Hairs.
translation.zh: 这里是默里奥黑尔一家

translation.en: -Leave a message. -[answering machine beeps]
translation.zh: 请留言

translation.en: [Luke] Hey, it's Luke. It's, uh, 10:00. Where are you?
translation.zh:
嘿 我是卢克 现在都十点了
你在哪里？

translation.en: Everyone's here.
translation.zh: 大家都到了

translation.en: Hey, y'all. Gonna be a scorcher today.
translation.zh: 嘿 你好 今天肯定热死了

translation.en: [Robin] Where are we? [Madalyn] I don't know.
translation.zh:
-我们这是在哪？
-我不知道

translation.en: [Robin] Grandma?
translation.zh: 外婆？

translation.en: [Madalyn] It's all right, Red. We're gonna get out of this.
translation.zh: 没事的 罗 我们能全身而退的

translation.en: -Garth? -[Garth] Yes, Mother.
translation.zh:
-加思？
-怎么了 妈

translation.en: Did you get a good look at anybody? Recognize anyone?
translation.zh:
你看清了吗？ -认出是谁了吗？
-没啊 妈

translation.en: -[Garth] No, Mother. -[Madalyn sighs]
translation.zh:
-认出是谁了吗？
-没啊 妈

translation.en: [Robin] Shh. I think someone's coming.
translation.zh: 好像有人来了

translation.en: Check their restraints.
translation.zh: 看看绳子松了没

translation.en: [Madalyn] You wanna tell us what the hell we're doin' here?
translation.zh: 告诉我们这是在干什么

translation.en: [man] Shut up.
translation.zh: 闭嘴

translation.en: [Madalyn] You're tellin' me to shut up?
translation.zh: 你让我闭嘴？

translation.en: I don't think you know whose weeds you're pissing in, buddy.
translation.zh: 我看你是不知道天高地厚啊 兄弟

translation.en: -I said shut up. -[Madalyn] I heard you.
translation.zh:
-我说 闭嘴
-知道

translation.en: I chose to ignore you.
translation.zh: 但我选择无视

translation.en: Who are you working for, huh?
translation.zh: 你是谁派来的？

translation.en: Did Jerry Falwell put you up to this, huh? The Baptists, that it?
translation.zh: 杰瑞法威尔派你来的？浸礼会吗？

translation.en: -[Garth whispers] Mother, please. -I think we're good.
translation.zh:
-妈 别说了
-我觉得挺结实的

translation.en: All right, let's go.
translation.zh: 好了 我们走

translation.en: [Madalyn] Cocksuckers, you're not gonna get away with this!
translation.zh: 狗杂种 你们会付出代价的！

translation.en: [shouting] Don't you know who I am?
translation.zh: 你们不知道我是谁吗？

translation.en: [softly] God damn it.
translation.zh: 该死的！

translation.en: -[dogs barking] -[indistinct radio chatter]
translation.zh: （奥斯汀 德克萨斯州）

translation.en: So, Mr. Collier, you say the cars are gone now.
translation.zh: 科利尔先生 您说车不在了

translation.en: Shouldn't they just be in them?
translation.zh: 他们不会在车上吗？

translation.en: [Roy] The door was open, breakfast on the table,
translation.zh: 门开着 早餐在桌上

translation.en: -and they'd never leave without the dogs. -[man] Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: 他们出门一定会带狗的

translation.en: And you say that this lady lives here with her son and his daughter?
translation.zh:
而且你说这位女士
和她儿子和孙女住在这里？

translation.en: Yes. Uh, no. The granddaughter's from her other son.
translation.zh: 对 不对 孙女是她另外一个儿子的

translation.en: It's an interesting living arrangement.
translation.zh: 这么住真有意思

translation.en: Wait a minute.
translation.zh: 慢着

translation.en: Madalyn Murray O'Hair. That's who we're talking about here?
translation.zh: 咱们说的是麦达琳默里奥黑尔吗？

translation.en: Are you sure that this isn't just another one of her publicity stunts?
translation.zh: 你确定这不是她又在炒作？

translation.en: Aren't you even gonna take any fingerprints, sir?
translation.zh: 你都不采集指纹的吗 警官？

translation.en: [smacks lips] Mr. Collier, this is Texas.
translation.zh: 科利尔先生 这里是德克萨斯州

translation.en: Not against the law to go missing here.
translation.zh: 不采集指纹不违法

translation.en: [Madalyn] Garth, I loosened it. I loosened it.
translation.zh: 加思 我把绳子弄松了

translation.en: Come here. Give me your hands. Give me your hands.
translation.zh: 过来 把手给我

translation.en: -[Garth] What are you-- -Give me your hands.
translation.zh:
-搞什么…
-把手给我

translation.en: Just get it untied. That's...
translation.zh: 解开它 真…

translation.en: [Garth] I... I can't. [Madalyn] You can do it.
translation.zh:
-我办不到
-你可以的

translation.en: -[Garth] Oh, my God. It's really... -That's it. That's it.
translation.zh:
-天啊 真的…
-没错

translation.en: [Garth] What kind of knot is that?
translation.zh: 这是什么结？

translation.en: [Madalyn] Come on. You can do it.
translation.zh: 加油 你能解开的

translation.en: [Garth] Well, get closer to me, then.
translation.zh: 离我再近点

translation.en: -[Madalyn] Oh, all right. -[Garth grunts]
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: [Garth] Jesus! [Madalyn] Come on.
translation.zh:
-天啊！
-加油

translation.en: [Garth] Oh. Almost. I almost got--
translation.zh: 快好了 我快…

translation.en: [Madalyn] Come on. [Garth pants] No, I... No, it's not...
translation.zh:
-快啊
-不 不是…

translation.en: -It's useless. It's not gonna happen. -Jesus, Mary and Joseph!
translation.zh:
-没用的
-天啊 我的天啊！

translation.en: I knew I should have sent you to fucking Boy Scouts.
translation.zh: 我就知道早该把你送到童子军那儿

translation.en: [Garth] I don't know what you think you're gonna do anyway. They both have guns.
translation.zh: 你准备怎么做？他们都有枪

translation.en: [Madalyn sighs] If we could get these hoods off,
translation.zh: 如果能把头套拿掉

translation.en: we might have a better idea of what we're dealing with.
translation.zh: 或许就能更了解对手是谁

translation.en: -Come on. Try again. -[Garth] No.
translation.zh:
-加油 再来
-不行

translation.en: -[Madalyn] Come on, Garthy-- -No, stop it.
translation.zh:
-加油 加思…
-不 停手

translation.en: [Madalyn] Don't you disobey your mother!
translation.zh: 胆敢顶撞母亲！

translation.en: [Garth] Or what, you're gonna take me over your knee?
translation.zh: 不然呢？你要打我屁股？

translation.en: [Madalyn] Yes, I just might-- [Robin] Stop it, both of you!
translation.zh:
-对 我可能…
-你俩都够了！

translation.en: [Madalyn softly] God damn it, I have to pee.
translation.zh: 该死 我得小便

translation.en: Hey, people!
translation.zh: 嘿 各位

translation.en: If you don't let me out of here, I'm gonna piss all over your floor!
translation.zh: 要是不让我出去 我就尿地板上！

translation.en: [sighs] Lady, you're gonna need to calm down.
translation.zh: 女士 你得冷静一下

translation.en: [Madalyn] Calm down? You want me to calm down, shit for brains?
translation.zh: 冷静？你让我冷静 你傻吗？

translation.en: In case you hadn't noticed, we've got bags over our heads,
translation.zh: 看清楚了 我们脑袋上有头套

translation.en: we're all tied up and I gotta pee!
translation.zh: 而且还被绑起来 我要小便

translation.en: You do what we say and everyone gets out of here safe and sound.
translation.zh:
你按我们的吩咐去做
你们就能安全离开这里

translation.en: [Madalyn] Oh, now that sounds like the big man in charge.
translation.zh: 现在听来你像大老板

translation.en: Is that the big man in charge?
translation.zh: 是大老板在发话吗？

translation.en: Get this goddamn thing off of my head and show me who you are.
translation.zh:
把我脑袋上这破玩意儿摘掉
让我看看你是谁

translation.en: You think you got the balls to take me on?
translation.zh: 你觉得你有胆量直面我吗？

translation.en: [softly] Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: [Madalyn] What? What's going on?
translation.zh: 怎么了？怎么回事？

translation.en: -Garth, what's going on? -[Garth sighs]
translation.zh: 加思 怎么了？

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -Robin.
translation.zh:
-天啊
-罗宾

translation.en: [Madalyn] Oh, my God, is that who I think it is?
translation.zh: 天啊 是我知道的那个罗宾吗？

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Hello, Madalyn.
translation.zh: 你好 麦达琳

translation.en: -[Bill] This is Bill Murray. -Bill, it's Roy. Roy Collier.
translation.zh:
-我是比尔默里
-比尔 我是罗伊科利尔

translation.en: What do you want?
translation.zh: 你想怎么样？

translation.en: It's your mom... and Robin and Garth.
translation.zh: 是你妈妈、罗宾和加思

translation.en: They've disappeared.
translation.zh: 他们失踪了

translation.en: I just saw them in Dallas.
translation.zh: 我刚在达拉斯看到他们

translation.en: I'm not kidding.
translation.zh: 我没开玩笑

translation.en: The police said that in order for somebody to officially be considered missing,
translation.zh: 警方说 要想以失踪为由立案

translation.en: they need somebody in the family to file a report.
translation.zh: 必须有一名家人报警

translation.en: Why would I do that?
translation.zh: 我为什么要报警？

translation.en: Besides, they're probably off on some crazy trip again.
translation.zh: 再说了 他们可能又是去疯玩了

translation.en: -No, this is different, Bill. -Roy...
translation.zh:
-不 这次不同 比尔
-罗伊…

translation.en: you know they're not in my life anymore.
translation.zh: 你也知道他们再也与我无关了

translation.en: And, frankly, I'd like to keep it that way.
translation.zh:
而且 说实话 我不愿意和他们
扯上关系

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好了吗？

translation.en: Bill--
translation.zh: 比尔…

translation.en: Ferguson...
translation.zh: 弗格森

translation.en: I need those 600 words on the Alamo anniversary by 5:00.
translation.zh:
五点前把阿拉莫纪念日的那六百字
交给我

translation.en: Relax, man. It's the same story I wrote last year and the year before that.
translation.zh:
放松 兄弟 我去年前年都写过
同样的故事

translation.en: Well, can't help it if nothing ever happens in San Antonio.
translation.zh: 圣安东尼奥没新闻 我也帮不了你啊

translation.en: No, plenty happens in San Antonio. I just don't get to write about it.
translation.zh:
错了 圣安东尼奥新鲜事很多
只不过轮不到我写

translation.en: -Where you going? -[phone ringing]
translation.zh: 你要去哪？

translation.en: [sighs] Shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: -Jack Ferguson. -[Roy] This is the reporter?
translation.zh:
-杰克弗格森
-是记者吗？

translation.en: On a good day.
translation.zh: 找对人了

translation.en: You know Madalyn Murray O'Hair? She's disappeared.
translation.zh:
你知道麦达琳默里奥黑尔吧？
她失踪了

translation.en: Madalyn Murray O'Hair?
translation.zh: 麦达琳默里奥黑尔？

translation.en: The damn cops won't do anything.
translation.zh: 混蛋警方无所作为

translation.en: Only thing I could think to do was call a reporter.
translation.zh: 我唯一能想到的办法就是联系记者

translation.en: -Who's this? -Name's Roy. But I gotta go.
translation.zh:
-你是谁？
-我叫罗伊 但我得走了

translation.en: If you wanna know more, come by 1682 Greystone Drive tonight.
translation.zh:
如果你想知道更多
今晚八点灰石车道1682号见我

translation.en: -What-- -I'll be there.
translation.zh:
-搞什么…
-我会到场的

translation.en: -[dial tone] -Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: [Pup] Madalyn?
translation.zh: 麦达琳？

translation.en: Bless this food to our use...
translation.zh: 感谢主赐予我们食物

translation.en: and us to thy service.
translation.zh: 我们为您效劳

translation.en: -Amen. -[Mrs. Murray] Amen.
translation.zh:
-阿门
-阿门

translation.en: Now, I don't suppose you found a job today?
translation.zh: 我觉得你今天没找到工作吧？

translation.en: [Madalyn] I had an interview.
translation.zh: 我参加面试了

translation.en: But I didn't get a law degree to be a damn receptionist.
translation.zh: 但我有法律学位 可不是为了当前台

translation.en: [chuckles] You'd be lucky to be someone's receptionist.
translation.zh: 你要能当前台 就已经算走大运了

translation.en: If I were you, I'd start praying.
translation.zh: 我要是你 就开始祈祷

translation.en: How do you put up with him, Mother?
translation.zh: 你怎么能受得了他啊 妈？

translation.en: The question is, how do I tolerate you?
translation.zh: 问题是 我怎么能受得了你？

translation.en: Living here for free.
translation.zh: 白住在这里

translation.en: -Bringing a bastard into my house. -Pup!
translation.zh:
-带个私生子回家
-帕！

translation.en: Don't you ever call my son that.
translation.zh: 少这样说我儿子

translation.en: Sweetie, why don't you just take your dinner and go on to our room? Hmm?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你带上晚餐 回咱俩的房间 好吗？

translation.en: [Pup] I am sorry, Billy Boy.
translation.zh: 抱歉 小比利

translation.en: I was just trying to make a point about your momma, huh?
translation.zh: 我刚就是想说说你妈妈

translation.en: I've got a point I'd like to make.
translation.zh: 我有话要说

translation.en: What else is new?
translation.zh: 你能有何新事？

translation.en: No, this is important.
translation.zh: 不对 这次很重要

translation.en: Got an announcement.
translation.zh: 我有话要宣布

translation.en: Getting another grandchild.
translation.zh: 你们马上又要有一个外孙了

translation.en: That's right. Your precious daughter's got herself knocked up again.
translation.zh: 你的宝贝姑娘又被人搞大肚子了

translation.en: -Oh, honey, no. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-别啊 亲爱的
-真的

translation.en: And the guy's kicked me to the curb again, saying it's not his,
translation.zh: 那家伙又抛弃了我 说不是他的孩子

translation.en: when I know for a fact it absolutely is his.
translation.zh: 但我知道肯定是他的

translation.en: You're an embarrassment.
translation.zh: 你真让我丢脸

translation.en: That's right. That's right.
translation.zh: 对 就这样

translation.en: Walk away.
translation.zh: 走开

translation.en: Just like they did.
translation.zh: 和他们的做法一样

translation.en: I'm sorry, Mother.
translation.zh: 抱歉 妈妈

translation.en: -You wanna tell me what happened? -I don't know. Condom broke?
translation.zh:
-要告诉我怎么回事吗？
-我不知道 避孕套破了？

translation.en: You sure you wanna keep it?
translation.zh: 你确定不打掉？

translation.en: I mean, I can take care of Pup, and you know how he loves little Bill,
translation.zh:
我可以做做帕的工作
你也知道他有多爱小比利

translation.en: and hopefully he'll come around.
translation.zh:
我可以做做帕的工作
你也知道他有多爱小比利 希望他能改变主意

translation.en: He's right.
translation.zh: 他说得对

translation.en: I got a law degree and no job, and a kid and no husband.
translation.zh:
我有法律学位 但没工作
有孩子 但没丈夫

translation.en: The only thing I do have is judgment. I get plenty of that.
translation.zh:
我唯一还有的就是被人评判
这我可有很多

translation.en: Maddy, you made a couple of mistakes, that's all.
translation.zh: 麦达 你犯了几个错误 仅此而已

translation.en: You know, I see these housewives in their identical homes
translation.zh:
我看到那些家庭主妇们 她们住着同样的房子
过着如出一辙的生活…

translation.en: with their identical lives, and...
translation.zh:
她们住着同样的房子
过着如出一辙的生活…

translation.en: They disgust me, but sometimes I...
translation.zh: 让我很恶心 但有时我…

translation.en: I wish I could be like that, wish I could live like that.
translation.zh: 我倒希望能那样活着

translation.en: But I can't.
translation.zh: 但我不行

translation.en: I don't know what to tell you.
translation.zh: 不知道该和你说什么

translation.en: Mom, just lie to me.
translation.zh: 和我撒谎就行

translation.en: -Tell me everything's gonna be all right. -Oh...
translation.zh: 告诉我一切都会好的

translation.en: Well, I could be a secretary.
translation.zh: 我可以当秘书

translation.en: Telephone operator.
translation.zh: 或者电话接线员

translation.en: You could sell Avon like Ms. Wright.
translation.zh:
你可以像莱特女士一样
卖雅芳化妆品

translation.en: We're just too damn smart for these hicks.
translation.zh:
以我们的聪明才智
做这些工作就浪费了

translation.en: -[chanting] We will fight! -[young Bill] What's going on?
translation.zh:
-我们要斗争！
-怎么了？

translation.en: I'll bet they're going to the White Tower restaurant.
translation.zh: 我敢说他们要去白塔餐厅

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Well, Billy Boy... [sighs]
translation.zh: 小比利

translation.en: not all people are treated the same in this world.
translation.zh:
这个世界上
并非所有人都被平等相待

translation.en: Because they're non...
translation.zh: 因为他们不…

translation.en: -Noncon-- -Nonconformist?
translation.zh:
-不…
-不信奉国教？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Well, you could say that, I guess.
translation.zh:
-对
-我觉得你可以这么说

translation.en: White Tower won't serve Negroes... so they're protesting.
translation.zh: 白塔餐厅不接受黑人顾客 所以他们在抗议

translation.en: And if they protest, will that make the White Tower serve them?
translation.zh:
所以他们在抗议 如果他们抗议
白塔餐厅会接受黑人吗？

translation.en: No, the owners of that place are damn racists.
translation.zh: 不会的 那个店家就是个种族歧视者

translation.en: Makes me so mad.
translation.zh: 这让我愤恨不已

translation.en: I bet they call themselves Christians, too.
translation.zh: 他们肯定也自称基督教徒

translation.en: Grandpa says you might find a job if you were more Christian.
translation.zh:
外公说你如果更信基督教
那你就能找到工作

translation.en: Ah, your grandpa's full of crap.
translation.zh:
外公说你如果更信基督教
那你就能找到工作 你外公满口胡言

translation.en: Grandpa says you're the one full of crap.
translation.zh: 外公说你才是满口胡言

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Well, you're always going on about what's wrong with people,
translation.zh: 你总在说人们错了

translation.en: but you don't do anything about it.
translation.zh: 但你却不做出改变

translation.en: You just complain.
translation.zh: 只会抱怨

translation.en: [newscaster] Close to 100 demonstrators stepped out to protest the whites-only policy
translation.zh:
近百名示威者上街抗议
巴尔的摩市中心

translation.en: of the White Tower restaurant in downtown Baltimore.
translation.zh: 白塔餐厅仅接受白人顾客的规定

translation.en: The activists were met with some resistance
translation.zh: 激进者与种族隔离支持者对峙

translation.en: from supporters of segregation.
translation.zh: 遇到了巨大阻力

translation.en: [woman] I think that, uh, as much as we regret it, integration is here,
translation.zh:
我认为 尽管我们后悔
但这里就是在种族融合

translation.en: and I would like to be able to do as much as I can to prevent it coming.
translation.zh: 我愿意尽所能 避免种族融合的发生

translation.en: [newscaster] But one white woman and her son actually showed up
translation.zh:
但一名白人女子和她的儿子
出现在示威人群中

translation.en: to march with the Negroes.
translation.zh: 和黑人共同抗议

translation.en: The owners of the White Tower restaurant should be ashamed of themselves.
translation.zh: 白塔餐厅的店主应该感到羞愧

translation.en: This is Baltimore, not Nazi Germany.
translation.zh: 这里是巴尔的摩 不是纳粹德国

translation.en: [newscaster] And what about you, young man? Why are you here?
translation.zh: 你呢 小朋友 你为什么会来？

translation.en: [young Bill] I'm here because I don't like racists,
translation.zh: 我来是因为我反对种族主义

translation.en: and because I'm a nonconformist like my mom.
translation.zh: 因为我像妈妈一样 不信奉国教

translation.en: That's my boy.
translation.zh: 好儿子

translation.en: What were you thinking?
translation.zh: 你当时在想什么呢？

translation.en: I was trying to teach your grandson a lesson.
translation.zh: 我当时在给你外孙上课

translation.en: "Judge not, lest ye be judged."
translation.zh: “不要评判人 免得被人评判”

translation.en: What about the neighbors?
translation.zh: 邻居们会怎么想？

translation.en: What do you care what nosy old Mrs. Mosley thinks?
translation.zh: 你在乎好事的莫斯利太太的想法？

translation.en: You really are one selfish SOB.
translation.zh: 你真是个自私的混蛋

translation.en: Just 'cause you read the goddamn Bible every night,
translation.zh: 就因为你每晚读他妈的《圣经》

translation.en: you think you're so high and mighty and moral,
translation.zh:
就以为自己很清高 很了不起
很高尚

translation.en: when there are people out there
translation.zh: 但还有人们

translation.en: who are actually, really, truly suffering--
translation.zh: 却在真的受难…

translation.en: -You know, I've got some cold cuts-- -Mother, it's all--
translation.zh:
-我有一些冷肉片…
-妈 都…

translation.en: You have no right to lecture me about morality.
translation.zh: 你无权教育我道德水准

translation.en: You can take your morals and shove them up your ass.
translation.zh: 你可以带着你的道德去见鬼

translation.en: May the Lord have mercy on your soul, Madalyn.
translation.zh: 愿主怜悯你的灵魂 麦达琳

translation.en: Ooh, the Lord. I'm quaking in my boots.
translation.zh: 主啊 我双腿都在瑟瑟发抖

translation.en: Where was the Lord when I got knocked up, huh?
translation.zh: 我肚子被搞大的时候 主在哪里？

translation.en: Where is the Lord now?
translation.zh: 主现在又在哪里？

translation.en: [Madalyn] What, Mother?
translation.zh: 怎么了 妈妈？

translation.en: I believe we need a spiritual revolution in America.
translation.zh: …我相信美国需要一场精神革命

translation.en: We need a revolt against materialism,
translation.zh: 需要一次反唯物主义的起义

translation.en: a revolt against crime,
translation.zh: 反罪恶

translation.en: a revolt against the emphasis on sex,
translation.zh: 反过分强调性别

translation.en: a revolt against the sins...
translation.zh: 反罪行…

translation.en: [Madalyn] It's like I keep telling you, it's just case after case down there.
translation.zh:
就像我一直在和你说的那样
事情一件接着一件

translation.en: [Mrs. Murray] Such a shame.
translation.zh: 真遗憾

translation.en: And then I've got this Negro girl with a baby,
translation.zh:
我这有个带孩子的黑人姑娘… （巴尔的摩 马里兰州
1960年）

translation.en: who got thrown out of her home, and there is no place to put her. I mean, no place whatsoever.
translation.zh: …被逐出家门 现在无安身之地

translation.en: -We have looked-- -[Bill] Mom.
translation.zh:
-我们看了…
-妈

translation.en: Just a sec, Bill.
translation.zh: 马上 比尔

translation.en: No idea why I went into social work.
translation.zh: 真不知道我为什么要参加社会服务

translation.en: I thought I could help people.
translation.zh: 我以为自己能帮助别人

translation.en: But I can't. There's too much red tape--
translation.zh: 但其实不然 有太多官僚作风…

translation.en: -[Bill] Mom! -Jesus, Mary and Joseph.
translation.zh:
-妈！
-天啊 我的天啊

translation.en: I said, "Just a sec."
translation.zh: 刚说了“马上”

translation.en: Now you be good for Grandma, right, Garth?
translation.zh: 和外婆在一起没问题吧 加思？

translation.en: [Billy Graham] You can find everything that you've been searching for in Christ.
translation.zh:
你一直在找寻的东西
在基督身上都能找到

translation.en: And I'd better not come home and find my son watching that claptrap with you.
translation.zh:
我回家时 最好别让我
看到你和我儿子在看这一派胡言

translation.en: I don't want him getting any ideas.
translation.zh: 我可不想让他习得这些思想

translation.en: I'm gonna get in trouble again.
translation.zh: 又要有麻烦了

translation.en: Well, it's not my fault you missed the bus.
translation.zh: 你错过公交不是我的错啊

translation.en: Okay. All right, I'll talk to the teacher if I have to, okay?
translation.zh:
好吧 有必要的话我可以和老师谈
好了吗？

translation.en: [students] Our Father, who art in heaven, hallowed be thy name...
translation.zh:
我们在天上的父
愿人尊你的名为圣…

translation.en: -We are not making a habit of this. -I know.
translation.zh:
-我们不能养成送你的习惯
-我知道

translation.en: -You've gotta start getting up earlier. -I know. What the hell is that?
translation.zh: 你得早点起床 这是在干什么？

translation.en: Oh, don't tell me that's the Lord's Prayer. -Yeah. -What are you...
translation.zh:
-别告诉我这是主祷文
-就是

translation.en: -You gotta be kidding me. -They make us say it every day.
translation.zh:
-什么？逗我呢？
-他们强迫我们每天读

translation.en: -They make you read the Bible, too? -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 强迫你们读《圣经》？

translation.en: I told the teacher I don't believe in prayer and asked to be excused.
translation.zh: 我和老师说我不信 请允许我离开

translation.en: And what did she say?
translation.zh: 她说什么？

translation.en: She said we all have to bow our heads and pray.
translation.zh: 她说我们所有人都必须低头祈祷

translation.en: [all] ...and the power and the glory.
translation.zh: …权柄 荣耀 全是你的 直到永远

translation.en: -Amen. -What the hell's going on in here?
translation.zh:
-阿门
-这是搞什么？

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.zh: 抱歉？

translation.en: If I wanted my son to learn the Lord's Prayer,
translation.zh: 我要是想让儿子学主祷文

translation.en: I would've sent him to goddamn Catholic school.
translation.zh: 我早就把他送天主教学校了

translation.en: -Mrs. Murray-- -Ms. Murray.
translation.zh:
-默里夫人…
-默里女士

translation.en: Ms. Murray...
translation.zh: 默里女士

translation.en: this is our morning devotion.
translation.zh: 现在是我们的清晨祈祷时间

translation.en: Well, I would like my son excused from the morning devotion.
translation.zh: 那好 我不想让我儿子参加清晨祈祷

translation.en: -You don't want him to-- -Mmm-mmm.
translation.zh: 你不想让他…

translation.en: I've never heard of anything like this in my life.
translation.zh: 我从没听过这种话

translation.en: Well, Mrs.... uh, Lutz, is it?
translation.zh: 鲁茨夫人 是吗？

translation.en: My son, like myself, is an atheist.
translation.zh: 我儿子和我一样都是无神论者

translation.en: -Isn't that right, Bill? -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 对吧 比利？

translation.en: I cannot excuse your son from the morning devotion.
translation.zh: 我不能让你儿子不参加清晨祈祷

translation.en: It is required by the board, and it is the law.
translation.zh:
这是学校董事会的强制要求
而且是法律规定

translation.en: The law?
translation.zh: 法律规定？

translation.en: Have you heard about the Constitution, by any chance?
translation.zh:
你有没有碰巧听说过
什么叫《宪法》啊？

translation.en: Kids, I hope she's not teaching you history,
translation.zh: 我真希望你们的历史课不是她教

translation.en: because, apparently, she flunked that class.
translation.zh: 因为很显然 她误人子弟

translation.en: In the Constitution, there is something called the First Amendment.
translation.zh: 《宪法》中有个第一修正案

translation.en: And that protects the freedom of speech and religion.
translation.zh: 其保护了言论自由和宗教自由

translation.en: Are there any Jews in the class?
translation.zh: 班上有犹太人吗？

translation.en: Do your parents know that you are being forced to recite
translation.zh: 你父母是否知道校方强制你们背诵

translation.en: -this archaic drivel? -Ms. Murray!
translation.zh:
-这番古代的胡言？
-默里女士

translation.en: -I'm just trying to make a point. -Obviously.
translation.zh:
-我就是要证明观点
-是啊 很显然

translation.en: The school board cannot force my son to pray, or anyone else for that matter.
translation.zh:
学校董事会不得强制我儿子
或强制任何人祈祷

translation.en: So... sue them.
translation.zh: 那你去起诉他们啊

translation.en: First of all, can I just say, it is wonderful to see you all again.
translation.zh:
首先 我想说的是
再次见到你们真是太好了

translation.en: Garth. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 加思

translation.en: Lose a few pounds? You're looking good.
translation.zh: 瘦了？看起来很棒

translation.en: Robin... did you miss me?
translation.zh: 罗宾 想我了吗？

translation.en: -For fuck's sake, David, get to the point. -Hey, I'm with you.
translation.zh:
-可恶 说重点吧
-我同意

translation.en: I wanna keep this reunion as brief as possible.
translation.zh: 我也想让这次重聚尽可能简短

translation.en: So here's the deal.
translation.zh: 所以 这样

translation.en: -Tomorrow-- -Wait, tomorrow?
translation.zh:
-明天…
-慢着 明天？

translation.en: -What about the dogs? -Don't worry, sweetie.
translation.zh:
-狗狗们怎么办？
-别担心 亲爱的

translation.en: Tomorrow...
translation.zh: 明天

translation.en: you're gonna write us a little check, and then we will be happy
translation.zh:
你给我们开一张支票
然后我们会欣然

translation.en: to get you the hell out of this place.
translation.zh: 把你们带离这里

translation.en: A check? [scoffs]
translation.zh: 支票？

translation.en: I'm gonna make this easy on you, Madalyn. What we want is just a drop in the bucket.
translation.zh:
这次让你好过一点
我们就不狮子大开口了

translation.en: [Madalyn] And what is that?
translation.zh: 那是要多少？

translation.en: -A million dollars. -[Madalyn laughs]
translation.zh: 一百万美元

translation.en: For fuck's sake...
translation.zh: 可恶…

translation.en: -It's not a fucking joke, lady. -Uh, listen...
translation.zh:
-他妈的不是在开玩笑 女士
-听好了…

translation.en: I don't know what this guy's told you,
translation.zh: 我不知道这家伙和你说了什么

translation.en: but my organization is a nonprofit organization.
translation.zh: 但我的组织是个非盈利性组织

translation.en: -There's no money-- -In theory,
translation.zh:
-没钱…
-理论上来说

translation.en: American Atheists is a nonprofit, but... [scoffs]
translation.zh: 美国无神论者协会是非盈利的

translation.en: but we both know that there are a few offshore accounts
translation.zh: 但我们都知道你们有几个海外账户

translation.en: that will not bear that out.
translation.zh: 这可和你们的表述相悖啊

translation.en: New Zealand, for example.
translation.zh: 比如说 新西兰

translation.en: -[Roy grunts] What is this shit? -[indistinct rustling]
translation.zh: 这是什么人？

translation.en: -Hello? -[knocks on door]
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: Jesus.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Mr. Ferguson, Roy Collier. I work for Madalyn.
translation.zh:
弗格森先生 我是罗伊科利尔
我为麦达琳工作

translation.en: Where did you get my name?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道我的名字？

translation.en: You covered our protests of the courthouse nativity scene last Christmas.
translation.zh:
去年圣诞节的时候 你报道了我们抗议
在法院摆放耶稣出生场景的新闻

translation.en: Thought you could use a real story for once.
translation.zh: 我觉得你可不可以写点真事啊

translation.en: And all three of them, they lived here?
translation.zh: 他们三个人都住这里吗？

translation.en: They were inseparable.
translation.zh: 他们形影不离

translation.en: Nobody thought that was kind of weird?
translation.zh: 没人觉得奇怪吗？

translation.en: Trust me, there's a lot of weird shit going on in this family.
translation.zh: 信我 这家里奇怪的事多了去了

translation.en: -Mr. Ferguson-- -Call me Jack.
translation.zh:
-弗格森先生…
-叫我杰克就行

translation.en: Jack.
translation.zh: 杰克

translation.en: I think something really bad's happened here,
translation.zh: 我觉得这里发生了很糟糕的事

translation.en: but nobody seems to believe me.
translation.zh: 但似乎没人信我

translation.en: -Not even the people at American Atheists? -[sighs] No, she's done this before.
translation.zh: 就连美国无神论者协会的人都不信？ 不信 她之前这么做过

translation.en: Disappeared for a few weeks, popped up in Mexico.
translation.zh: 消失几周 然后在墨西哥出现

translation.en: They think this may be another one of her fundraising ploys.
translation.zh: 他们觉得这可能是她又一出筹款戏

translation.en: I'd be inclined to believe 'em.
translation.zh: 我倾向于相信他们

translation.en: No, she would have left me instructions.
translation.zh: 不会的 她会事先给我留下指示

translation.en: And she never would've left the dogs behind.
translation.zh: 而且肯定不会留下狗狗不管

translation.en: Okay, look, Roy. This isn't really my area of expertise.
translation.zh:
好吧 听我说 罗伊
这真不是我的专长领域

translation.en: Then why did you come?
translation.zh: 那你为什么还来？

translation.en: Well, I thought there might be a story here.
translation.zh: 我觉得这里可能有故事

translation.en: Jackpot.
translation.zh: 找到了

translation.en: Passports.
translation.zh: 多本护照

translation.en: Still doesn't prove that they're not just out of town.
translation.zh: 还是没法证明他们不仅是出城而已

translation.en: Okay, let's say you're right. Let's say they were kidnapped.
translation.zh: 假如说被你说中了 他们被绑架了

translation.en: -Or worse. -What about Robin's father?
translation.zh:
-或者更糟糕
-罗宾的爸爸呢？

translation.en: -Bill Jr.? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-小比尔？
-对

translation.en: He hasn't spoken to his family in years.
translation.zh: 他几年都没和家人联系过了

translation.en: His ass won't even file a missing person's report.
translation.zh:
照他的德行
肯定都不会报人口失踪案

translation.en: Well, then he should be at the top of your list.
translation.zh: 那他应该列在你单子的首位

translation.en: No. No.
translation.zh: 不会的

translation.en: Bill and his mom may have had some issues, but he would never do anything like this.
translation.zh:
比尔和他妈妈或许是有些矛盾
但他肯定不会这么做

translation.en: Well, then, who would?
translation.zh: 那谁会这么做？

translation.en: Are you kidding?
translation.zh: 你开玩笑呢？

translation.en: Do you know how many death threats this woman would receive in a day?
translation.zh:
你知道这女人
每天会收到多少死亡恐吓吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: No. Right. Uh, no, I know.
translation.zh: 不 对 不 我知道

translation.en: Well, I...
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: Oh. Yeah. No, I... I do know Mr. Epstein from the Austin branch, right?
translation.zh:
对 不 我认识爱泼斯坦先生
他是奥斯汀分支的 对吧？

translation.en: Garth, come on.
translation.zh: 加思 给点力啊

translation.en: [Madalyn] Good morning.
translation.zh: 早上好

translation.en: Okay. Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [stammers] Yup. Right, we'll talk then. Bye-bye. Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: 对 我们到时候再谈 拜拜

translation.en: So... [sighs]
translation.zh: 那么…

translation.en: I can only get $600,000.
translation.zh: 我只能弄到六十万美元

translation.en: That's what's in our personal account.
translation.zh: 我们个人账户只有这么多

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Where is the rest of it?
translation.zh: 其余的呢？

translation.en: It's in dummy trusts.
translation.zh: 都在假信托里

translation.en: It's in dummy what now?
translation.zh: 在假什么里？

translation.en: They have to wire it here, the 600 grand, from New Zealand next week.
translation.zh: 这六十万得下周从新西兰转过来

translation.en: Next week?
translation.zh: 下周？

translation.en: And I have to sign for it in person.
translation.zh: 而且我得亲自签字

translation.en: [Gary] Hey...
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Are you lying?
translation.zh: 你在撒谎吗？

translation.en: Gary, calm down.
translation.zh: 加思 冷静

translation.en: I'm calm. He's a big boy.
translation.zh: 我很冷静 他是个大男孩了

translation.en: You didn't plan this very well, did you, David?
translation.zh: 你没计划好吧 戴维？

translation.en: I am in no mood for a jerk-off contest.
translation.zh: 我没兴趣和他比谁先开枪

translation.en: Do I need to remind you who's holding the guns here?
translation.zh: 需要我提醒你现在枪在谁手里吗？

translation.en: Everybody just needs to settle in... and try and get along.
translation.zh: 大家都应该冷静一下 设法相处

translation.en: Looks like we're gonna be roommates for a few days.
translation.zh: 看来我们要当几天室友了

translation.en: You don't think the police are gonna be looking for me?
translation.zh: 你觉得警方不会找我吗？

translation.en: No, Madalyn, I don't think anyone's gonna be looking for you.
translation.zh: 没错 麦达琳 我觉得没人会找你

translation.en: William Murray Jr.
translation.zh: 小威廉默里

translation.en: Mr. Murray, Jack Ferguson, San Antonio Daily Journal.
translation.zh:
默里先生 我是杰克弗格森
《圣安东尼奥日报》的

translation.en: I don't give quotes on my mother, Mr. Ferguson.
translation.zh: 我不会评论我母亲的 弗格森先生

translation.en: -I assume that's what you're after. -Uh, sort of.
translation.zh: 我猜这是你的意图 差不多 我在了解你家人的失踪案

translation.en: I'm looking into your family's disappearance.
translation.zh: 差不多 我在了解你家人的失踪案

translation.en: Roy Collier call you?
translation.zh: 罗伊科利尔打给你了？

translation.en: Let me give you some advice, Mr. Ferguson.
translation.zh: 我给你些建议

translation.en: Don't waste your time. You don't wanna look like a fool when they suddenly show up.
translation.zh:
别浪费时间了
等他们回来的时候 你就难堪了

translation.en: Roy seems to think this is different.
translation.zh: 罗伊觉得这次不一样

translation.en: Well, I guess it's possible they finally left the country for good.
translation.zh: 我猜 他们可能永远离开了这个国家

translation.en: They've been putting money from American Atheists
translation.zh:
多年来 他们一直在把
美国无神论者协会的资金

translation.en: into offshore accounts for years.
translation.zh: 转移到海外账户上

translation.en: Embezzlement?
translation.zh: 挪用公款？

translation.en: My mother prefers to call it "creative accounting."
translation.zh: 我妈妈更喜欢称之为“创造性会计”

translation.en: Now, if you'll excuse me, Mr. Ferguson...
translation.zh: 失陪了

translation.en: Uh, one question.
translation.zh: 有个问题

translation.en: The dogs...
translation.zh: （美国无神论者协会 海外） 罗伊说他们去哪都会带着狗狗们

translation.en: Roy said that they took them everywhere.
translation.zh: 罗伊说他们去哪都会带着狗狗们

translation.en: Sure, she treats those things better than her own family.
translation.zh: 她对这些狗比对家人都好

translation.en: Well, that's why he's so worried. They left them behind.
translation.zh:
所以他才非常担心
因为他们把狗狗留在家里了

translation.en: Goodbye, Mr. Ferguson.
translation.zh: 再见 弗格森先生

translation.en: [newscaster] Communist guerrillas, hiding out in the brush.
translation.zh:
（巴尔的摩 马里兰州
1961年） 共产党游击队藏在树丛中

translation.en: Skirmishes such as this have been plaguing the country...
translation.zh:
这些小规模战争
一直困扰着这个国家

translation.en: [Mrs. Murray] Madalyn, I just don't get this.
translation.zh: 麦达琳 我就是搞不懂

translation.en: I still can't understand why those children can't say one little prayer.
translation.zh: 我还是不理解 为什么那些孩子们不能稍稍祈祷一下

translation.en: They can pray all they want to.
translation.zh: 他们想祈祷什么都可以

translation.en: -School can't force 'em to. -Okay, Maddy.
translation.zh:
但学校不能强迫他们 好了 麦达
但你不能让别人来斗争吗？

translation.en: But can't somebody else fight this?
translation.zh:
好了 麦达
但你不能让别人来斗争吗？

translation.en: Mom.

就是想要有时候
某处的某个人可以理解我

《约翰尼卡森今夜秀》

-妈

从每日与宗教无关的祈祷开始

他们的观点是

到时候 人们会和现在一样

-我来给你们个例子
-好

以至于将他的独生子赐给我们！

我还被枪击数次

translation.en: [inhales deeply] Drove my poor mother to an early grave, I do believe.

我觉得这导致了
我可怜的母亲英年早逝

translation.en: [newscaster] The center has a printing press, library and recording studio

该中心配备了
一台印刷机、一个图书馆和录音室

所以 只要战斗不休

在新奥尔良

translation.en: the Reverend Bob Harrington.

translation.en: Madalyn, what exactly is it that you have against God?

translation.en: First off, there isn't any.

translation.en: through organized churches, your organized movement.

translation.en: And every single one of them, including you,

现在 麦达琳 我见到你的样子
听你所说

你为什么在乎我要去哪里？

translation.en: You know... you and I could make money doing this.

translation.en: I do okay, thanks.

translation.en: Oh, sure. We... we both do okay.
translation.zh: 当然了 咱们都过得不错

translation.en: But together, we could do a hell of a lot better.

translation.en: You just give that a little thought, Madalyn.

耀眼的新奥尔良福音传教士

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, there is a devil among us.

translation.en: Pray to save the soul of Madalyn Murray O'Hair.

祈祷上帝拯救
麦达琳默里奥黑尔的灵魂

translation.en: Save me? Save me?

translation.en: Oh, Jesus couldn't save himself.

translation.en: The New Testament?

translation.en: Oh, a load of bull written by a bunch of faggots.

translation.en: -Oh, come on. Y'all know that. -[audience jeering]

translation.en: Yeah. Oh, that's not bad.

每次你痛骂《圣经》
我就多拯救了五十个灵魂

translation.en: Oh, not bad. We'll do better in Kansas City.

translation.en: I'll burn the goddamn book in Kansas City.

translation.en: -Oh, Praise the Lord! -[laughing] Thank you, Garth. [chuckles]

translation.en: I'll keep praying for your soul, Madalyn.

等他摊上麻烦需要擦屁股时
就会回来的

他就是需要休息下
很快我们会再见到他的

translation.en: Hey, when all this is over, how about we take a little trip, huh?

嘿 等这一切都结束了
我们稍微出去旅行一下如何？

translation.en: [Bill] I spent the last 20 years trying to escape the overpowering shadow of my mother.
translation.zh:
过去二十年来
我一直在试着摆脱母亲强大的影子

translation.en: While she was fighting the world... I was fighting for my life.
translation.zh:
她在与全世界斗争的时候
我在为自己的生活拼搏

translation.en: I didn't realize how bad it had gotten till...
translation.zh:
当时我没意识到情况有多严重
直到

translation.en: I got out of Austin and...
translation.zh: 我离开了奥斯汀

translation.en: started locking myself in the bathroom every night
translation.zh: 开始把自己锁在浴室

translation.en: with a bottle of whiskey and a bucket of ice.
translation.zh: 带上一瓶威士忌和一桶冰

translation.en: And then one night, I...
translation.zh: 然后有一天夜里

translation.en: I had this sudden rush of sorrow.
translation.zh: 我突然感觉到一阵难过

translation.en: Because I understood.
translation.zh: 因为我懂了

translation.en: I understood the, uh... the hatred
translation.zh: 我懂了妈妈感受到的

translation.en: and the... the self-pity that she was feeling.
translation.zh: 痛恨和自哀

translation.en: Because that's what I was feeling.
translation.zh: 因为我体会到了同样的感受

translation.en: But I come here, and I...
translation.zh: 但我到这里之后

translation.en: I see others, much worse situations than me, and...
translation.zh: 看到了其他人情况比我更糟糕

translation.en: you overcome, and you accept them.
translation.zh: 但你宽恕了他们 接受了他们

translation.en: And that, uh...
translation.zh: 而这…

translation.en: That's what I'm gonna do.
translation.zh: 这就是我要做的

translation.en: [group] Our Father...
translation.zh: 我们

translation.en: [Bill] ...who art in heaven, hallowed be thy name.
translation.zh: 在天上的父 愿人尊你的名为圣

translation.en: [all] Thy kingdom come, thy will be done, on earth as it is in heaven.
translation.zh:
愿你的国降临 愿你的旨意行在地上
如同行在天上

translation.en: Give us this day our daily bread, forgive us our trespasses,
translation.zh:
我们日用的饮食 今日赐给我们
免我们的债

translation.en: as we forgive those who trespass against us.
translation.zh: 如同我们免了人的债

translation.en: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.
translation.zh: 不叫我们遇到试探 救我们脱离凶恶

translation.en: For thine is the kingdom and the power and the glory...
translation.zh: 因为国度 权柄 荣耀 全是你的

translation.en: forever and ever...
translation.zh: 直到永远

translation.en: [group] Amen.
translation.zh: 阿门

translation.en: [Bill] Amen.
translation.zh: 阿门

translation.en: Frank, I need another day on the Riverwalk article.
translation.zh:
弗兰克 河畔步行街那篇文章
我还需要一天时间

translation.en: I just got a new lead on the O'Hair story.
translation.zh: 奥黑尔的故事我有了新进展

translation.en: -Frank, listen. -Jack--
translation.zh:
-弗兰克 听我说
-杰克…

translation.en: Robin Murray's Porsche just turned up abandoned at the airport
translation.zh: 罗宾默里的保时捷被发现遗弃在机场

translation.en: and Garth's car sold to some guy out by Canyon Lake. I mean, come on.
translation.zh:
加思的车被峡谷湖的一个家伙出售了
拜托

translation.en: Follow it up.
translation.zh: 跟进

translation.en: -Are you serious? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-认真的吗？
-对啊

translation.en: Frank! I love you!
translation.zh: 弗兰克！我爱你！

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [man] Nope. I didn't buy it from him.
translation.zh: 不是 我不是从他手里买的

translation.en: -You sure? -Positive.
translation.zh:
-确定？
-确定

translation.en: It was a short guy. He was younger, had dark hair.
translation.zh:
是个矮个子家伙
比较年轻 深色头发

translation.en: All right. If I sent a sketch artist to your house, would you be willing to sit down with him?
translation.zh:
如果我派素描画家去你家
你可以和他坐下来画吗？

translation.en: -Sure. [sighs] -Thanks, Mr. Sparrow.
translation.zh: 当然了 谢谢 斯帕罗先生

translation.en: I don't get it.
translation.zh: 我不懂

translation.en: What kind of religious nut goes off and sells a stolen car?
translation.zh:
什么样的宗教狂人
会发疯把偷来的车卖掉？

translation.en: Well, maybe this isn't the work of a religious nut.
translation.zh: 或许这不是宗教狂人干的

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 你什么意思？

translation.en: Well, Madalyn was stashing loads of cash, right?
translation.zh: 当时麦达琳在囤现金 对吧？

translation.en: Makes for the greatest motive of all.
translation.zh: 所有动机中的罪魁祸首

translation.en: Greed.
translation.zh: 贪婪

translation.en: This is just like the old days.
translation.zh: 就像往日一样

translation.en: You used to let me win.
translation.zh: 你之前可是会让我赢的啊

translation.en: You were the boss. I had to.
translation.zh: 你之前是老板 我必须让你赢

translation.en: Does that mean I'm supposed to let you win now?
translation.zh: 那意思是我现在该让你赢了？

translation.en: You do have the gun.
translation.zh: 枪在你手里

translation.en: And we all know what that means. Compensating for a very small cock.
translation.zh:
咱俩都知道是什么意思
带枪是为了心理上弥补自己鸡鸡短小

translation.en: -Right, Red? -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 对吧 罗？

translation.en: -That's what you always say, Grandma. -[Madalyn chuckles]
translation.zh: 你常常这么说 奶奶

translation.en: Oh, come on, Madalyn. You can do better than that.
translation.zh: 别这样 麦达琳 你可以有更好的词

translation.en: I don't waste my best lines on small-time crooks.
translation.zh:
我的大好台词才不会浪费在
不足挂齿的骗子身上

translation.en: You're just as much of a crook as I am,
translation.zh: 你和我一样是骗子

translation.en: rippin' people off in the name of your cause.
translation.zh: 以你事业的名义掠夺别人的财产

translation.en: That is bullcrap!
translation.zh: 纯属胡扯

translation.en: I have devoted my life to protecting the First Amendment.
translation.zh: 我的一生致力于保护第一修正案

translation.en: The things I've had to endure.
translation.zh: 我需要忍受的那些事

translation.en: Made a little money along the way. I deserve it.
translation.zh: 或许顺便会赚点小钱 但是我应得的

translation.en: You are so full of yourself,
translation.zh: 你还真是只关注自己

translation.en: you can't see the fucking forest for the trees.
translation.zh: 一叶障目 不见森林

translation.en: While you're out fighting the world,
translation.zh: 你在外与全世界对抗

translation.en: you're making real enemies right under your nose.
translation.zh: 就在眼前树敌

translation.en: You get a load of that, Red? David Waters is lecturing me.
translation.zh:
你听到了 罗？
戴维沃特斯在教育我

translation.en: Your own son would tell you the exact same thing.
translation.zh:
就算你儿子
也会和你说这一样的话

translation.en: And...
translation.zh: 而且…

translation.en: gin.
translation.zh: 金胡

translation.en: I led a life wasted without faith in the Lord.
translation.zh:
我过着没有信仰上帝的生活
浪费此生

translation.en: And I hope I can right some of the wrongs I caused.
translation.zh: 我希望能改正过错

translation.en: I see my mother as a sinner now.
translation.zh: 现在我视母亲为罪恶

translation.en: She demanded things of God, and when he refused her requests, well...
translation.zh:
她向上帝提出各种要求
被回绝之后

translation.en: she began to battle with him openly.
translation.zh: 她就开始公然与上帝宣战

translation.en: Now all she cares about is... getting wealthy by hating God.
translation.zh:
她现在只在乎
通过憎恨上帝而赚得盆满钵满

translation.en: [interviewer] Do you love your mother?
translation.zh: 你爱你母亲吗？

translation.en: [Bill] Oh, I love my mother. I forgive my mother.
translation.zh: 我爱我的母亲 我也原谅她

translation.en: But I'm not proud of what she did to this country.
translation.zh:
但她对这个国家的所作所为
我不以为荣

translation.en: [interviewer] Do you pray for her?
translation.zh: 你会为她祈祷吗？

translation.en: [Bill] I wish I could pray for her.
translation.zh: 我希望能为她祈祷

translation.en: Turn it off.
translation.zh: 关掉

translation.en: [Bill] But I'm afraid it wouldn't do any good.
translation.zh: 但恐怕对她而言祈祷无济于事

translation.en: Sold out to the highest bidder, the goddamn church.
translation.zh: 把自己出卖给了出价最高的混蛋教会

translation.en: Mother.
translation.zh: 妈

translation.en: I've been called every dirty name in the book.
translation.zh: 这书中用尽了所有脏字来骂我

translation.en: There's not a day goes by without a death threat.
translation.zh: 每天都会收到死亡威胁

translation.en: None of it hurt, but this... This...
translation.zh: 这些都不会伤到我…

translation.en: Garth, am I really that bad of a mother?
translation.zh: 加思 我这个母亲真的那么差劲吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有啊

translation.en: Mother, I will always be here.
translation.zh: 妈 我会一直陪着你

translation.en: -We'll both always be here. -[Madalyn] Oh...
translation.zh: 我们都在这里

translation.en: Mr. Waters.
translation.zh: 沃特斯先生

translation.en: [Madalyn] Thank you, Roy.
translation.zh: 谢谢 罗伊

translation.en: -Ms. O'Hair, it is a pleasure. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 奥黑尔女士 很荣幸

translation.en: Oh, well, have a seat. [clears throat]
translation.zh: 请坐

translation.en: I saw you on Carson last week.
translation.zh: 上周我在卡森的节目中看到了你

translation.en: [chuckles] I love the way you shut Billy Graham up.
translation.zh:
我喜欢你霸气
堵住比利格雷厄姆嘴的样子

translation.en: Oh, thank you. It was a little easier than it looked.
translation.zh: 谢谢 其实比大家看到的要容易一点

translation.en: Now you're just being modest.
translation.zh: 现在你开始谦虚了

translation.en: That preacher's more full of shit than a Christmas turkey, that's for sure.
translation.zh: 那个牧师比圣诞节火鸡都能胡扯

translation.en: Oh, hell, he's more full of shit than a goddamn humpback whale!
translation.zh: 去他的 他比座头鲸都能胡扯！

translation.en: So... you're here about the, uh, office management position?
translation.zh: 你是来应聘办公管理的职位吗？

translation.en: -[clicks tongue] Yes, ma'am. -Yeah, you sure you, uh, wanna join us?
translation.zh: 是的 女士 你确定要加入我们？

translation.en: Right now, we're holding this place together
translation.zh: 现在 我们的日子不好过

translation.en: with bailing wire and chewing gum.
translation.zh: 举步维艰

translation.en: I have held together more with less.
translation.zh: 我曾在困境下出色完成工作

translation.en: My son, Bill, he used to, uh, run the place.
translation.zh: 之前是我儿子比尔管理这里

translation.en: But, uh... he screwed me over.
translation.zh: 但他耍了我

translation.en: Oh, now those goddamn zombie twelve-steppers got a hold of him and...
translation.zh:
现在那些酒鬼匿名会成员
抓住了他 而且…

translation.en: Do you, uh, drink, Mr. Waters?
translation.zh: 你喝酒吗 沃特斯先生？

translation.en: I do have a few of the usual vices.
translation.zh: 我确实有一些常见的恶习

translation.en: Oh, good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: 'Cause I do not go in for that teetotalin' crap.
translation.zh: 因为我才不信有人滴酒不沾

translation.en: There we go.
translation.zh: 来

translation.en: Here's to.
translation.zh: 敬事业

translation.en: It has been mentioned that you, uh... spent some time in the Illinois State Pen.
translation.zh:
文件上提到了
你在伊利诺斯州监狱待过？

translation.en: [stammers] Just a few petty crimes... when I was younger.
translation.zh: 就是年少时犯的轻罪而已

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 那好

translation.en: if Hail Marys really could absolve us... we'd all be goddamn murderers.
translation.zh:
如果万福马利亚真的能赦免我们
那我们全都是罪人了

translation.en: Now the first thing she wants you to do is help get the books in order.
translation.zh:
她想让你做的第一件事
就是帮忙把账本放整齐

translation.en: We usually get the statements from Bank of Austin on the third of the month.
translation.zh:
每月三号
我们从奥斯汀银行拿银行账单

translation.en: This is where we keep the ledger.
translation.zh: 这里是我们放账本的地方

translation.en: You'll have the only key, besides me.
translation.zh: 除我之外 唯一的一把钥匙给你

translation.en: You'll register all processed checks here.
translation.zh: 你要在这里登记所有清算完毕的支票

translation.en: Wait, these are all donations?
translation.zh: 慢着 这些都是捐赠？

translation.en: That's right.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: There's a check here for $20,000. Another for 12.
translation.zh:
这张支票是两万美元
还有一张一万二的

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: In God we trust. Right?
translation.zh: 我们相信上帝 对吗？

translation.en: Good luck.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: Mmm, what's going on?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: The money made it out of New Zealand.
translation.zh: 钱转出新西兰了

translation.en: It won't be long now.
translation.zh: 不会太久了

translation.en: [chuckles] It's about time.
translation.zh: 时间差不多了

translation.en: The van's out back.
translation.zh: 货车在后边

translation.en: Garth...
translation.zh: 加思

translation.en: you try anything... anything, Madalyn and Robin are dead.
translation.zh:
你敢耍花招
麦达琳和罗宾就死定了

translation.en: No, I got it.
translation.zh: 好 我懂

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走

translation.en: Bye, Mother.
translation.zh: 拜拜 妈

translation.en: -You be careful, Garth. -[Garth] Okay.
translation.zh:
-小心 加思
-好

translation.en: You know those bills are gonna be marked. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 你知道这些纸币肯定被做了记号

translation.en: They're getting a cashier's check.
translation.zh: 他们要从收银台拿支票

translation.en: Then we're using that to buy gold coins. Something that can't be traced.
translation.zh:
然后我们用来买金币
这样就不会被追踪了

translation.en: -Here you go, Grandma. -Thank you, darlin'.
translation.zh:
-给 外婆
-谢谢你 亲爱的

translation.en: Well, it looks like you might have me here.
translation.zh: 看来这次我大不过你

translation.en: 'Night.
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: [mutters] Wait a minute.
translation.zh: 慢着

translation.en: Gin.
translation.zh: 金胡

translation.en: You'll win next time.
translation.zh: 下次你会赢的

translation.en: -[scoffing] Yeah. -[chuckling] Sure, I'll win one of these days.
translation.zh: 是啊 没错 总有一天会轮到我赢

translation.en: You've done a real good job here, David.
translation.zh: 你做得很棒 戴维

translation.en: But, uh...
translation.zh: 但是

translation.en: I want you to know I did some, uh... digging...
translation.zh: 我要告诉你 我查了查

translation.en: into your record.
translation.zh: 你的记录

translation.en: True you were picked up for hustling?
translation.zh: 你真的是因为参与卖淫被抓吗？

translation.en: I told you I am trying to put all that behind me.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你了我在试着忘掉这一切

translation.en: I don't give a shit what you do with your pecker.
translation.zh: 我才不在乎你和你的鸡鸡做了什么

translation.en: But, David...
translation.zh: 但是戴维

translation.en: you killed a man.
translation.zh: 你杀过人

translation.en: Now, tell me about him.
translation.zh: 跟我说说吧？

translation.en: Just between us.
translation.zh: 就咱俩知道

translation.en: I didn't have a picture-perfect childhood, Madalyn.
translation.zh: 我的童年不完美 麦达琳

translation.en: My mother was a prostitute.
translation.zh: 我妈妈是个妓女

translation.en: And she was in and out of prison so much that I'd do
translation.zh: 她在监狱里进进出出

translation.en: whatever I had to do to survive.
translation.zh: 我得尽我所能才能生存

translation.en: I hooked up with this gang. I started stealing here and there, and...
translation.zh: 我加入了一个黑帮 然后到处偷东西

translation.en: this guy we were with got caught after this liquor store job we did.
translation.zh:
有次偷酒类专卖店
我们的同伙被抓了

translation.en: He turned on me.
translation.zh: 他揭发了我

translation.en: I may not believe in God, but I do believe in karma.
translation.zh: 我可能不信上帝 但我信报应啊

translation.en: All that crap about past lives?
translation.zh: 关于前世那些胡扯？

translation.en: Yeah, well...
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: maybe not karma.
translation.zh: 或许不是报应

translation.en: Retaliation.
translation.zh: 是报复

translation.en: I was gonna teach this guy a lesson.
translation.zh: 于是我准备给那家伙上一课

translation.en: But when I started with that tire iron...
translation.zh: 但当我拿起拆轮胎棒时

translation.en: I don't know, I just...
translation.zh: 我不知道 我就是

translation.en: I lost control.
translation.zh: 失去了控制

translation.en: [sighs] I got 30 years, but I only did half.
translation.zh: 我被判服刑三十年 但我只服了一半

translation.en: Got out for good behavior.
translation.zh: 因为表现良好提前出狱

translation.en: And I swore I would never lose control again.
translation.zh: 然后我发誓再也不会失控了

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Thank you for telling me the fucking truth.
translation.zh: 谢谢你他妈告诉我真相

translation.en: Yeah, you live long enough and you lose faith in people.
translation.zh: 人活久了 就会失去对人的信念

translation.en: -Not that I ever had much faith in anyone. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 但不是说我对任何人抱有过信念

translation.en: But...
translation.zh: 但是

translation.en: you have impressed me, David.
translation.zh: 你让我刮目相看 戴维

translation.en: Starting to wish Bill Jr. could've turned out more like you.
translation.zh: 真希望小比利能与你有几分相似

translation.en: He really hurt you, huh?
translation.zh: 他真的伤到你了吧？

translation.en: He betrayed me.
translation.zh: 他背叛了我

translation.en: That's what men do. Betray me.
translation.zh: 男人就会这么做 背叛我

translation.en: But, no, David, he didn't hurt me.
translation.zh: 但是没有 戴维 他没有伤害我

translation.en: Nobody can really hurt me.
translation.zh: 没有人能伤到我

translation.en: Now that I trust you, I wanna show you something.
translation.zh: 现在我信任你 我有东西要给你看

translation.en: I'm giving you a promotion, David.
translation.zh: 我要给你升职了 戴维

translation.en: So far, you've been keeping track of most of our donations
translation.zh:
目前为止 我们已经
允许你跟进官方账本中

translation.en: in the official ledger book.
translation.zh: 我们接受的大多数捐赠

translation.en: I say most of them because...
translation.zh: 我说大多数是因为

translation.en: this is our unofficial ledger.
translation.zh: 这是我们的非官方账本

translation.en: I'll keep your secrets, you keep mine.
translation.zh: 我保守你的秘密 你也保守我的

translation.en: Where are the rest?
translation.zh: 其他的呢？

translation.en: In the trunk.
translation.zh: 在后备箱

translation.en: Well, at least $400,000 of it is.
translation.zh: 最少有四十万美元

translation.en: Four hundred? Gary, what the hell?
translation.zh: 四十万？盖瑞 搞什么？

translation.en: The fucking guy didn't have enough.
translation.zh: 那该死的家伙货不够

translation.en: We get the rest next week.
translation.zh: 剩下的我们下周拿

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 妈的

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 妈的

translation.en: Shit! Shit! Shit! Shit! Shit!
translation.zh: 妈的！

translation.en: Is that really necessary?
translation.zh: 有这个必要吗？

translation.en: Oh, don't tell me it's another hiccup. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 别跟我说又是小问题

translation.en: [Garth] We have to wait for another shipment of coins.
translation.zh: 我们得等下一批金币到货

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: They'll be here next Tuesday.
translation.zh: 下周二就可以到

translation.en: Oh, for... This is getting ridiculous.
translation.zh: 这越来越离谱

translation.en: -Shut up. You're not in charge here. -[Madalyn laughing]
translation.zh: 闭嘴 这里不是你说了算

translation.en: All right, I got it. I got it. You're the big boss.
translation.zh: 好吧 我懂了 你是大老板

translation.en: But God damn it, David, if you aren't fucking up this job
translation.zh:
但他妈的 戴维
你要是把这活儿搞砸了

translation.en: like everything else you've ever done.
translation.zh: 就和你之前搞砸其他活一样

translation.en: Mother!
translation.zh: 妈！

translation.en: If I shot you in the head right now, do you think anyone would care?
translation.zh:
我如果朝你脑袋开枪
你觉得会有人在乎吗？

translation.en: The state of Texas would probably give me a fucking medal.
translation.zh:
德克萨斯州很可能
因此给我颁发一枚勋章呢

translation.en: Look at this.
translation.zh: 看看这

translation.en: $625,000 is missing from the New Zealand account.
translation.zh: 新西兰账户有62万5千美元失踪

translation.en: Withdrawn right after they disappeared.
translation.zh: 刚失踪后就被取走了

translation.en: I say we take the coins we've got and get out of town.
translation.zh: 要我说 我们带着拿到的金币出城

translation.en: They've got nothing.
translation.zh: 他们什么证据都没有

translation.en: If anything, this is just further proof that they took the money and ran.
translation.zh:
就算有的话
最多只能证明他们取钱逃走

translation.en: Oh, fuck.
translation.zh: 妈的

translation.en: We've got two more days before the second shipment comes through.
translation.zh:
我们还有两天时间
等第二批金币送过来

translation.en: And we have come too far to let a second-page story get in our way.
translation.zh: 事已至此 不能再出差错了

translation.en: Well, thank you for finally coming in here, Bill. Appreciate it.
translation.zh: 感谢你终于来了 比尔 谢谢

translation.en: When you told me about the dogs, I knew something wasn't right.
translation.zh:
你和我说狗狗的事情时
我就知道不对劲

translation.en: So, why'd it take you so long to file a report?
translation.zh: 你报个警怎么会要那么久？

translation.en: It's complicated. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 很复杂

translation.en: My mother turned my own daughter against me...
translation.zh: 我妈让我女儿与我对着干

translation.en: What did the cops say?
translation.zh: 警察说什么了？

translation.en: They told me they would get back to me if anything turned up.
translation.zh: 他们说如果有情况 会通知我的

translation.en: Wish I could say I was surprised.
translation.zh: 我真是一点也不惊讶

translation.en: So I sent a sketch artist down to work with the guy who bought Garth's car.
translation.zh:
我已经派了素描画家
去和加思车的买主一起画肖像

translation.en: Should have something soon. I would love for you to take a look.
translation.zh: 如果很快有结果 我想让你看看

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: Oh, this money that's gone missing,
translation.zh: 失踪的这笔钱

translation.en: do you have any idea who could've had access to that?
translation.zh: 你知道有谁能拿到这些钱吗？

translation.en: -Accountants? Lawyers? -Mmm.
translation.zh: 会计？律师？

translation.en: All her finances were done in-house at American Atheists.
translation.zh:
她的财务都是由
美国无神论者协会自己打理的

translation.en: You know... if somebody did something to them...
translation.zh: 如果有人对他们下手

translation.en: it's probably someone from that place.
translation.zh: 很可能是他们自己人

translation.en: My mother pissed off a lot of people.
translation.zh: 我妈惹怒了太多的人

translation.en: Especially those she was closest to.
translation.zh: 特别是之前和她走得近的人

translation.en: -[Christmas music playing] -[clears throat] Uh, excuse me, uh...
translation.zh:
（奥斯汀 德克萨斯州
1994年） 抱歉 我就是想说
美国无神论者协会过去一年很风光

translation.en: I just want to say American Atheists has had a wonderful year, and...
translation.zh:
我就是想说
美国无神论者协会过去一年很风光

translation.en: that would not be so without all of you.
translation.zh: 如果没有你们 肯定不会实现的

translation.en: So, thank you, and a very happy winter solstice.
translation.zh:
所以 谢谢各位
真是一个愉快的冬至日

translation.en: -Strike up the carols! [laughs] -[people cheering]
translation.zh: 开始唱圣诞颂歌！

translation.en: Mother loves Christmas. She really, really does.
translation.zh: 妈妈很爱过圣诞节 非常爱

translation.en: Oh, and you in your sweater. So darling.
translation.zh: 你穿着羊毛衫 好可爱

translation.en: -Will you get me a refill, Garthy? -[Garth] Of course.
translation.zh:
-能帮我续杯吗？
-当然了

translation.en: -I'll go check on those cookies. -Okay. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
-去看看饼干
-好

translation.en: The membership numbers are down, but the money is not.
translation.zh: 会员数量在下降 但钱数没下降

translation.en: The way Madalyn gets these rich, dying atheists
translation.zh:
麦达琳想办法
让有钱 垂死的无神论者

translation.en: to leave her their entire estates...
translation.zh: 将他们的所有财产都留给她

translation.en: It's a hell of a way to make a living.
translation.zh: 这种活法真是太厉害了

translation.en: She's not gonna live forever.
translation.zh: 她总有一天会死的

translation.en: And I don't know what she did to Bill,
translation.zh: 我不知道她对比尔做了什么

translation.en: but if I was him, I would have suffered through until she kicked the bucket,
translation.zh:
但如果我是他
在她死之前我肯定饱受折磨

translation.en: and then I would've taken the whole thing for myself.
translation.zh: 然后我就自己接管她的一切

translation.en: [chuckling] I mean, Garth's not gonna take over. Can you imagine?
translation.zh: 加思不会接管的 敢想吗？

translation.en: [imitating Garth] "Hello, people, we need to start fighting for the freedom of religion."
translation.zh:
“大家好 我们要开始
为了宗教自由而斗争了”

translation.en: Not funny, David.
translation.zh: 不好笑 戴维

translation.en: See anybody laughing?
translation.zh: 看到有人笑了吗？

translation.en: No more for him, huh?
translation.zh: 别再给他倒了

translation.en: Madalyn, sorry.
translation.zh: 麦达琳 抱歉

translation.en: I don't wanna hear your excuses.
translation.zh: 我不想听你的借口

translation.en: Right now, all I want out of you is breathing.
translation.zh: 现在 你负责喘气就行

translation.en: Very little of that.
translation.zh: 要求不多

translation.en: Come on. I just had a little bit too much to drink.
translation.zh: 拜托 我刚刚喝多了

translation.en: Oh, I am assuming it was the drink talking, otherwise I would fire your ass.
translation.zh:
我就认为你是酒后胡言吧
否则我开除了你

translation.en: What? You wanna get rid of me?
translation.zh: 什么？你要开除我？

translation.en: -[Madalyn sighs] -Go ahead.
translation.zh: 开除啊

translation.en: But I know a lot of secrets about the American Atheists.
translation.zh:
但我知道美国无神论者协会的
许多秘密

translation.en: Secrets that might interest the IRS in particular.
translation.zh: 国家税务局可能尤其感兴趣的秘密

translation.en: Are you threatening me?
translation.zh: 你是在吓唬我吗？

translation.en: Go, tell the IRS whatever you want.
translation.zh: 去啊 跟国家税务局说说清楚

translation.en: Scream it from the mountaintops.
translation.zh: 去站在山顶上大喊啊

translation.en: You think they're gonna believe a fucking felon?
translation.zh: 你以为他们会相信一个重罪犯？

translation.en: Get out of here. You're ruining my holiday party.
translation.zh: 滚出去 你毁了我的节日派对

translation.en: You really can be pathetic, you know.
translation.zh: 你真的很可悲 你心知肚明

translation.en: You just wanna be the momma I never had, give us both a second chance.
translation.zh:
你就是想当我没有过的母亲
给我俩二次机会

translation.en: Well, let me tell you something about my momma.
translation.zh: 我来告诉你我妈妈的事情

translation.en: I beat the shit out of her.
translation.zh: 我把她揍个半死

translation.en: I beat her to a bloody pulp.
translation.zh: 我把她打成了血浆

translation.en: You think your son Bill hurt you?
translation.zh: 你觉得你儿子比尔伤害你？

translation.en: Nah.
translation.zh: 不算

translation.en: Not like I hurt her.
translation.zh: 根本比不上我对她的伤害

translation.en: [Madalyn] Garth!
translation.zh: 加思！

translation.en: David Waters is a convicted felon.
translation.zh: 戴维沃特斯是个重刑犯

translation.en: He's a murderer.
translation.zh: 他是个谋杀犯

translation.en: And his mother was a goddamn whore.
translation.zh: 他母亲是个不折不扣的妓女

translation.en: And she's not the only one that sucked cocks for money.
translation.zh:
她可不是唯一一个
为了钱愿意吸鸡鸡的人

translation.en: Isn't that right, David? Isn't that right? You sucked cock--
translation.zh: 对吧 戴维？你吸鸡鸡…

translation.en: Don't fuck with me, Madalyn. Don't fuck with me.
translation.zh: 别他妈惹我 麦达琳 别惹我

translation.en: -[dogs barking] -[Robin] Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: Son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 狗娘样的

translation.en: -[commentator] Hello, football fans... -[knock on door]
translation.zh: 各位球迷大家好… （第十四天）

translation.en: We got beer, vodka, cigs.
translation.zh: 我们有啤酒、伏特加、烟

translation.en: Finally.
translation.zh: 终于啊

translation.en: [Madalyn] Hope you didn't forget about me, Danny.
translation.zh: 希望你没有忘记我 丹尼

translation.en: No, I did not.
translation.zh: 我没忘

translation.en: [Madalyn grunting] Oh, hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Sorry it ain't a martini.
translation.zh: 抱歉 不是马提尼

translation.en: Oh, it's the good stuff.
translation.zh: 这是好东西

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 耶

translation.en: My Billy Boy...
translation.zh: 我的小比利啊

translation.en: he used to mix a mean Manhattan.
translation.zh: 他之前会混着上等曼哈顿一起喝

translation.en: Here's to new friends.
translation.zh: 敬新朋友

translation.en: You're all right, Danny Fry.
translation.zh: 你还好吧 丹尼弗莱

translation.en: You know, I'm real sorry we're putting you through all this.
translation.zh: 让你摊上这事 我深感抱歉

translation.en: It's not you. It's David.
translation.zh: 不是你的错 是戴维

translation.en: I'd watch your ass around him if I were you.
translation.zh: 我要是你 早就盯着他了

translation.en: You know, I trusted him.
translation.zh: 我之前还信任他

translation.en: [chuckles] Look where it got me.
translation.zh: 看看他害我落得什么下场

translation.en: I'm, uh... heading to Florida next week
translation.zh: 我下周去佛罗里达州

translation.en: for my daughter's fifth birthday.
translation.zh: 参加女儿的五岁生日

translation.en: I'm using my take to set up her college fund.
translation.zh: 我要用分得的钱 为她准备大学费用

translation.en: Yeah. She's awful sweet.
translation.zh: 是啊 她非常可爱

translation.en: And lucky to have you for a father.
translation.zh: 有你这么个父亲 她真幸运

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: In the end...
translation.zh: 最后

translation.en: family is all we got.
translation.zh: 留在身边的只有家人

translation.en: -[Roy faintly] Hello. -[Bill sighs]
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: -[Roy] All right, sounds good. -[dog barking]
translation.zh:
（达拉斯会议
宗教领袖之子） 好啊 听着不错

translation.en: Jack just called.
translation.zh: 杰克刚打了电话

translation.en: He has the sketch of the guy who sold Garth's car.
translation.zh:
他已经画好了
卖给加思车的人的画像

translation.en: Who the fuck is that?
translation.zh: 这是谁？

translation.en: Get out!
translation.zh: 滚出去！

translation.en: [on recording] This is Bob Fry. Leave a message.
translation.zh: 我是鲍勃弗莱 请留言

translation.en: [chuckling] Hey, Bob, it's, uh... it's Danny.
translation.zh: 嘿 鲍勃 我是丹尼

translation.en: Um... You know, I was actually just headed back to Florida just now, but, um...
translation.zh:
我刚正在回佛罗里达州的路上
但是

translation.en: I've got a couple things I gotta tie up still here in Texas.
translation.zh:
我在德克萨斯州
又有了几件事需要摆平

translation.en: So, uh...
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: But I'm gonna be sending you a letter.
translation.zh: 但我会给你寄信的

translation.en: And if you could just hang onto it for me, that would be great.
translation.zh:
如果你愿意为我存着信
那就太好了

translation.en: Okay, thanks. Bye.
translation.zh: 好了 谢谢 拜拜

translation.en: Garth?
translation.zh: 加思？

translation.en: Yes, Mother?
translation.zh: 怎么了 妈？

translation.en: I know you don't like me very much.
translation.zh: 我知道你不是很喜欢我

translation.en: That's not true, Mother.
translation.zh: 怎么会啊 妈

translation.en: Well, you call me names behind my back.
translation.zh: 你在我背后用脏话骂我

translation.en: You mean like "fat cunt"?
translation.zh: 你是说“胖婊子”吗？

translation.en: You call me "fat cunt"?
translation.zh: 你说我是“胖婊子”？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对啊

translation.en: Well, you've called me worse.
translation.zh: 你对我的称呼更糟糕

translation.en: I suppose.
translation.zh: 可能吧

translation.en: It doesn't mean anything, you know that.
translation.zh: 但没任何意思 你也明白

translation.en: What about you, Red?
translation.zh: 你呢 罗？

translation.en: You hate me for taking you away from your father?
translation.zh: 你是否恨我把你带离你父亲身边？

translation.en: You didn't take me away from him.
translation.zh: 你没把我带离他身边

translation.en: I was too hard on him.
translation.zh: 我对他太严格了

translation.en: I'm too hard on all of you.
translation.zh: 我对你们都太严格了

translation.en: You're only hard on us because you believe we can be great.
translation.zh:
你只对我们严格
是因为你相信我们可以很出色

translation.en: I love you two.
translation.zh: 我爱你俩

translation.en: Everything I've ever done, I... I've done for you kids.
translation.zh: 我做的一切都是为你们啊 孩子们

translation.en: Bill, too.
translation.zh: 也包括比尔

translation.en: What do you say?
translation.zh: 你们看这样怎么样？

translation.en: When we get out of this,
translation.zh: 等这事结束后

translation.en: we take a drive down to Dallas and visit your father, hmm?
translation.zh:
我们开车去达拉斯
看看你爸爸怎么样？

translation.en: -Are you serious? -I am.
translation.zh:
-认真的吗？
-没错

translation.en: And if the bastard refuses to see us,
translation.zh: 如果那个混蛋拒绝见我们

translation.en: [chuckling] well, I'll just bang down the goddamn door.
translation.zh: 我就使劲敲门

translation.en: -Now, that I'd like to see. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 这我倒想看看

translation.en: I'm gonna miss you, Red.
translation.zh: 我会想你的 罗

translation.en: Don't call me that.
translation.zh: 别这么称呼我

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: No! No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: [newscaster] She called herself the most hated woman in America.
translation.zh: 她自称是美国最可恨的女人

translation.en: Tonight, the incredible case of Madalyn Murray O'Hair.
translation.zh: 今夜 传奇麦达琳默里奥黑尔案 （美国最可恨的女人）

translation.en: [reporter] In 1963, Madalyn Murray O'Hair found the cause that would make her famous.
translation.zh:
1963年 麦达琳默里奥黑尔
发现了能让她一举成名的事业

translation.en: And some say, rich.
translation.zh: 有人说 同时她也得到了财富

translation.en: She filed a lawsuit against the Baltimore public school board.
translation.zh: 她起诉了巴尔的摩的教育委员会

translation.en: The case would go all the way to the Supreme Court
translation.zh: 案件最终由最高法院审理

translation.en: in a landmark ruling that banned prayer in schools.
translation.zh:
法院判决禁止在学校祈祷
成为里程碑事件

translation.en: Over the next three decades,
translation.zh: 接下来的三十年间

translation.en: no one person has been thought a bigger threat to religion.
translation.zh: 她成为了宗教的最大威胁

translation.en: In 1995, Madalyn was 77 years old, in failing health,
translation.zh:
（乍得马丁
奥斯汀 德克萨斯州） 1995年 麦达琳77岁
风烛残年

translation.en: and likely would've spent her remaining years in relative obscurity.
translation.zh: 而且很可能余生都会深陷卑微

translation.en: Except that, before she could die,
translation.zh: 但是除此之外 在她死之前

translation.en: the nation's most famous atheist suddenly vanished.
translation.zh: 这位全国最著名的无神论者突然失踪

translation.en: [Jack] Well, the thing that strikes you is there was no panic
translation.zh: 让人震惊的是 麦达琳奥黑尔失踪时

translation.en: when the Murray O'Hairs disappeared.
translation.zh: 全国上下没有恐慌

translation.en: There was no real effort to find them. Uh...
translation.zh: 也没有人真的出力找她

translation.en: Yet there was over $600,000 missing, Robin's car was abandoned,
translation.zh:
还有逾六十万美元失踪
而且罗宾的车被遗弃

translation.en: and another was sold by a mysterious stranger.
translation.zh: 另一辆车被一名神秘陌生人出售

translation.en: [reporter] Mark Sparrow answered the ad in the newspaper
translation.zh:
马克斯帕罗回复了报纸上的
二手车广告

translation.en: and thought he'd found a steal of a deal
translation.zh: 认为这会是笔好买卖

translation.en: since the car was priced $5,000 below Blue Book value.
translation.zh:
因为车价比凯乐蓝皮书的标价
还便宜五千美元 （那不勒斯 佛罗里达州
1998年）

translation.en: But although Garth Murray's signature appears
translation.zh: 虽然加思默里的签名

translation.en: -on the title of transfer documents... -Danny?
translation.zh:
-出现在转账凭证的抬头上…
-丹尼？

translation.en: ...Sparrow is certain that the man who sold him the car was not Garth Murray.
translation.zh:
…但斯帕罗说 卖给他车的人
不是加思默里

translation.en: [Bob] Right before Danny disappeared, I got a call.
translation.zh: 就在丹尼失踪之前 我接到一通电话

translation.en: He told me he was sending a letter.
translation.zh: 他和我说要给我寄封信

translation.en: There weren't many details.
translation.zh: 没说多少细节

translation.en: But he said he and a guy named Gary Karr were in on a kidnapping scheme,
translation.zh:
但他说有一个叫盖瑞卡尔的人
有绑架计划

translation.en: brought in by somebody called David Waters.
translation.zh:
是由一个叫戴维沃特斯的人
拉入伙的

translation.en: David Waters?
translation.zh: 戴维沃特斯？

translation.en: Danny said these people they took...
translation.zh: 丹尼说他们绑架的那些人

translation.en: were expecting to come out of it alive.
translation.zh: 应该能被活着释放

translation.en: But he wasn't so sure.
translation.zh: 但他也不确定

translation.en: And you told all this to the police?
translation.zh: 你把这些都告诉警方了？

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: Yeah, but they didn't seem too keen on looking for a missing ex-con.
translation.zh:
对 但他们好像
对追捕失踪的前科犯不怎么感兴趣

translation.en: I called Waters up looking for Danny.
translation.zh: 我打给了沃特斯 找丹尼

translation.en: He made up some excuse.
translation.zh: 但他编了一些借口

translation.en: And then he threatened to kill my family.
translation.zh: 然后他威胁要杀我全家

translation.en: Are you prepared to go on the record?
translation.zh: 你准备好公开表明观点了吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 准备好了

translation.en: [woman] Mr. Waters, I'm not one for plea agreements,
translation.zh:
（圣安东尼奥 德克萨斯州
1998年） 我不准备进行辩诉交易
但这事不是我做主

translation.en: but I don't really have a say in the matter.
translation.zh:
我不准备进行辩诉交易
但这事不是我做主

translation.en: You've discussed this with your lawyer?
translation.zh: 你和律师探讨过此事了吗？

translation.en: Go ahead.
translation.zh: 说吧

translation.en: Gary was like a mad dog.
translation.zh: 盖瑞就像一条疯狗

translation.en: Sooner or later he was gonna bite.
translation.zh: 迟早他会咬人的

translation.en: David.
translation.zh: 戴维

translation.en: Oh, Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: God damn it, Karr. What the fuck did you do?
translation.zh: 该死 卡尔 你干了什么？

translation.en: [Danny] Jesus! David?
translation.zh: 天啊！戴维？

translation.en: What are we gonna do now? -[softly] Calm down. -[Danny breathing heavily]
translation.zh:
-现在我们怎么办？
-冷静

translation.en: I knew something like this was gonna happen.
translation.zh: 我就知道这种事会发生

translation.en: We gotta get her body into the bedroom so they don't see her.
translation.zh: 把她尸体放进卧室 别让他们看到

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: [sobbing] No! David, no!
translation.zh: 不！戴维 不！

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: Danny, do something!
translation.zh: 丹尼 做点什么啊！

translation.en: Mother!
translation.zh: 妈！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: -No! -Don't look! Don't look!
translation.zh:
-不！
-别看！

translation.en: [sobbing] Oh, God!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Do it.
translation.zh: 动手吧

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 这里

translation.en: Do it.
translation.zh: 动手

translation.en: Do it.
translation.zh: 动手

translation.en: Gary, I can't.
translation.zh: 加思 我做不到

translation.en: [David] He couldn't be trusted to keep his mouth shut, so...
translation.zh: 不能相信他 他管不住嘴

translation.en: I had Gary take him out, too.
translation.zh: 所以我让盖瑞把他也杀了

translation.en: [woman] What happened to the money?
translation.zh: 钱呢？

translation.en: We kept the gold in a storage locker.
translation.zh: 我们把金币放在了储物柜

translation.en: And when we went to collect... [sighs]
translation.zh: 等我们去拿的时候

translation.en: ...it was gone.
translation.zh: 金币已经不在了

translation.en: We'd been robbed.
translation.zh: 我们被抢了

translation.en: Fucking five-dollar lock.
translation.zh: 该死的便宜劣质锁

translation.en: I never intended to kill her.
translation.zh: 我从没想过要杀她

translation.en: But I can't say that I'm sorry that she's dead.
translation.zh: 但她死了 我也不会说抱歉

translation.en: [reporter] We're live here at Camp Wood,
translation.zh: 我们现在在伍德营直播

translation.en: where confessed murderer David Waters is leading police
translation.zh:
就在这里 自首的凶手戴维沃特斯
带着警方

translation.en: to the spot where he buried the bodies of Madalyn Murray O'Hair,
translation.zh: 去找那个他在1995年的惊悚之夜

translation.en: her son and granddaughter, on that gruesome night in 1995.
translation.zh:
埋藏麦达琳默里奥黑尔
及其儿子和孙女尸体的地点

translation.en: There were rumors that they had fled to New Zealand...
translation.zh:
当时有谣言说
他们早已飞往了新西兰…

translation.en: Well, at least she didn't go unnoticed.
translation.zh: 最起码 她没有默默无闻地死去

translation.en: ...police finally narrowed in on Waters and his partner in crime, Gary Karr...
translation.zh:
…警方最终排查到了
沃特斯和他的同伙盖瑞卡尔…

translation.en: She would've appreciated that.
translation.zh: 她肯定会很感激的

translation.en: ...also charged with the murder of a third kidnapper.
translation.zh: …其被指控谋害第三名绑匪

translation.en: Please, no prayers. She wouldn't have wanted that.
translation.zh: 请别祈祷了 她肯定不想看到

translation.en: Does it worry you that, uh, when you die, that there's not going to be nirvana
translation.zh:
如果你死后不会涅槃
或者不管你怎么称呼吧

translation.en: or whatever you care to call it?
translation.zh: 你会担心吗？

translation.en: [laughs] When I die, I don't want some religious nut
translation.zh: 当我死的时候 我不要让宗教狂人

translation.en: shoving a rosary up my ass or communion wafer down my throat.
translation.zh:
给我屁股里塞念珠串
也不要给我喉咙里塞圣餐饼

translation.en: But I wouldn't mind a small corner of the outdoors
translation.zh: 但我不介意把我埋在户外的一隅

translation.en: where the sun can filter through the trees and lay a gentle hand on my face.
translation.zh: 让阳光透过树木 轻柔地洒在我脸颊

translation.en: Three words on my tombstone.
translation.zh: 然后墓碑上给我刻三个词

translation.en: "Woman." I've loved being a woman.
translation.zh:
“女人”
我爱自己生为女人

translation.en: "Grandmother." I've loved being a grandmother.
translation.zh:
“奶奶”
我爱自己为人奶奶

translation.en: And "mother." I have loved being a mother.
translation.zh:
“母亲”
我爱自己为人母亲

translation.en: That's what I'd like to be remembered for most.
translation.zh: 我最想以这三条被世人记住

translation.en: That's what I'd like it to say on my tombstone, but...
translation.zh: 我想在墓碑上写这些 但是

translation.en: being who I am, I'm not expecting I'll be having a goddamn tombstone. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
鉴于我现在这样
我也不期待有人会给我立墓碑了
